rows.label: qst201910_msg0001
rows.name:
Alala and friends were just
asked to do a job, mo!

rows.label: qst201910_msg0002
rows.name: Oh? And what was that job?

rows.label: qst201910_msg0003
rows.name:
The job of burying four barrels
in various places in Alst, mo.

rows.label: qst201910_msg0004
rows.name:
We only buried them, so Alala
and friends don't know what's
inside the barrels, mo!

rows.label: qst201910_msg0005
rows.name: I see... A rather clever fool.

rows.label: qst201910_msg0007
rows.name:
You thought it was too risky to keep a
large sum of money in one place, so you
split it up and hid it, correct?

rows.label: qst201910_msg0008
rows.name: As expected of Meleph. That is correct.

rows.label: qst201910_msg0009
rows.name:
Now, you black-feathered
fools! Confess the location
of the barrels to us!

rows.label: qst201910_msg0010
rows.name:
We get it, mo! We'll tell you,
so don't get so close, mo!

rows.label: qst201910_msg0011
rows.name:
The barrels are... near
Sauros's Bed in Gula...

rows.label: qst201910_msg0012
rows.name:
...near the Leaning Tower of
Dorrick in Temperantia...

rows.label: qst201910_msg0015
rows.name:
...near the Wonder Spring
Plaza Ruins in the middle
of Spirit Crucible Elpys...

rows.label: qst201910_msg0016
rows.name:
...and finally, we buried
one near the Balquors Ruins
at the Cliffs of Mors, mo.

rows.label: qst201910_msg0014
rows.name:
Let us go at once to dig
up our one million gold!
